name: punty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long iron rod used when making glass: He transferred the glass to a solid rod called a punty. The underside of a hand-blown drinking glass will have a pontil mark.
More examplesFewer examplesThe man whose job was to stick a quantity of melted glass on to the punty was called a punty-sticker.Some of the old bottles have bases with pontil scars.Arriving at the mould, the punty was stopped in its rotation.
